caption.p: Structural and morphological properties of CsZn xPb 1-xX 3 NCs at a different content of Zn 2+. ( a,b) XRD patterns of CsZn xPb 1-xCl 3 and CsZn xPb 1-xBr 3 NCs. ( c) Schematic overview of contraction of octahedral after partially replacing Pb 2+ by smaller Zn 2+ ions. ( d,e) TEM images (scale bar, 50 nm) of the NCs. ( f,g) Histograms showing size distribution of corresponding NCs.
